packages.name: ATLAS CANYON & CHEGAGA DESERT
packages.overview: From the High Atlas mountains to the golden dunes of Chegaga, experience the best of southern Morocco on this 6-day journey through ancient kasbahs, desert camps, and Hollywood film locations.

itineraire.title: Arrival in Marrakech
itineraire.description: Welcome at the airport. Transfer to your riad. Overnight at your accommodation.

itineraire.title: Marrakech – Tizi n'Tichka – Ouarzazate
itineraire.description: Cross the High Atlas mountains via the Tichka pass (2260m). Visit Atlas Studios. Dinner and overnight at hotel.

itineraire.title: Ouarzazate – Zagora – Mhamid – Chegaga
itineraire.description: Journey to Mhamid by 4x4 through the Draa Valley. Arrive at Chegaga dunes. Camel ride at sunset. Dinner and overnight at desert camp.

itineraire.title: Chegaga – Mhamid – Ouarzazate – Aït Benhaddou
itineraire.description: Sunrise camel ride. Visit Aït Benhaddou Kasbah (UNESCO site). Dinner and overnight at riad.

itineraire.title: Aït Benhaddou – Telouet – Marrakech
itineraire.description: Visit the Pacha's Palace in Telouet. Return to Marrakech. Lunch included. Overnight at hotel.

itineraire.title: Marrakech – Departure
itineraire.description: Breakfast and transfer to airport for your return flight.

practical_info.pickup: Our representative will wait outside the terminal, left side, near the Voyage Privé banner.
practical_info.medina_access: Riads in the medina are not accessible by car. Porters available (2-5€).
practical_info.notes: This itinerary may be modified up to 48h before arrival.

packages.name: THE ESSENCE OF MARRAKECH & MOROCCAN SPA - 3 NIGHTS
packages.overview: Experience the magic of Marrakech with this short but rich package combining cultural exploration, relaxation, and a desert adventure.

itineraire.title: Arrival in Marrakech
itineraire.description: Welcome at the airport. Transfer to your riad. Free day to rest or explore. Overnight at your riad.

itineraire.title: Marrakech Discovery & Spa
itineraire.description: Breakfast at the riad. Free day to explore the Medina: Koutoubia Mosque, Jemaa El-Fna Square, Ben Youssef Madrasa. Evening pick-up for a traditional hammam, scrub, and massage at a Moroccan spa.

itineraire.title: Hot-Air Balloon & Agafay Desert
itineraire.description: Early pick-up for sunrise hot-air balloon flight with panoramic views. Traditional breakfast after the flight. Return to riad, check-out, then transfer to Agafay Desert camp. Traditional dinner and overnight at the camp.

itineraire.title: Departure
itineraire.description: Breakfast at the camp. Transfer to airport for your return flight.

practical_info.pickup: Representative outside terminal, left side near Voyage Privé banner.
practical_info.medina_access: Riads not accessible by car - porters available (2-5€).
practical_info.notes: Local taxes payable on arrival in dirhams.

packages.name: ROYAL CITIES OF MOROCCO
packages.overview: Discover Morocco's imperial cities: Marrakech, Casablanca, Rabat, Meknes, and Fes on this comprehensive cultural journey.

itineraire.title: Arrival in Marrakech
itineraire.description: Welcome at airport. Transfer to riad. Free day. Overnight at riad.

itineraire.title: Marrakech – Casablanca
itineraire.description: Departure to Casablanca. Visit Arab League Park, Notre-Dame de Lourdes Church, Habous district, and exterior of Hassan II Mosque. Lunch at local restaurant. Overnight at hotel.

itineraire.title: Casablanca – Rabat – Meknes – Fes
itineraire.description: Visit Rabat: Royal Palace (exterior), Hassan Tower, Mohammed V Mausoleum. Continue to Meknes: El Hedim Square, Moulay Ismail Mausoleum, Sahrij Souani. Continue to Fes. Overnight at hotel.

itineraire.title: Fes
itineraire.description: Full day exploring Fes medina, Andalusian quarter, Al Quaraouiyine Mosque, Bou Inania Madrasa, and traditional tanneries. Lunch at traditional Fassi restaurant. Overnight at hotel.

itineraire.title: Fes – Ifrane – Beni Mellal – Marrakech
itineraire.description: Cross the Middle Atlas through Ifrane and Azrou. Lunch in Beni Mellal. Continue to Marrakech with stop at the palm grove. Overnight at hotel.

itineraire.title: Marrakech Guided Tour
itineraire.description: Half-day guided tour of Marrakech: Ben Youssef Madrasa, Dar El Bacha district, souks, Rahba Kedima Square. Free time at Jemaa El-Fna Square. Lunch at panoramic restaurant. Overnight at hotel.

itineraire.title: Free Day & Farewell Dinner
itineraire.description: Free day at leisure. Evening farewell dinner at Dar Essalam Palace with traditional music and dance show. Overnight at hotel.

itineraire.title: Departure
itineraire.description: Breakfast. Transfer to airport for return flight.

practical_info.pickup: Representative outside terminal, left side near Voyage Privé banner.
practical_info.medina_access: Riads not accessible by car - porters available.
practical_info.notes: This itinerary may be modified up to 48h before arrival.

packages.name: LES INCONTOURNABLES MARRAKECH ET SES ENVIRONS - 3 NIGHTS
packages.overview: Experience the must-sees of Marrakech and its surroundings with hot air balloon and desert camp.

itineraire.title: Arrival in Marrakech
itineraire.description: Welcome at airport. Transfer to Riad Dar Massai. Free day. Overnight at riad.

itineraire.title: Hot Air Balloon & Agafay Desert
itineraire.description: 04:45 pick-up from Place Saadian Tombs for sunrise hot-air balloon flight. Breakfast after flight. Return to riad, check-out. 13:30 pick-up from Place Saadian Tombs. Transfer to White Camel Camp in Agafay. Dinner and overnight at camp.

itineraire.title: Agafay Desert – Marrakech Medina
itineraire.description: Breakfast at camp. Morning at leisure by the pool. 14:45 return to Marrakech. Guided tour of the Medina starting at Koutoubia Mosque. Return to riad at 18:30. 20:30 dinner at traditional Moroccan restaurant. Overnight at Riad Dar Massai.

itineraire.title: Departure
itineraire.description: Early breakfast. 06:05 pick-up from Place Saadian Tombs. Transfer to airport for flight U21254 at 09:05.

practical_info.pickup: Representative outside terminal, left side near Voyage Privé banner.
practical_info.medina_access: Riads not accessible by car - porters available.
practical_info.notes: Local taxes payable on arrival. Pick-up times may vary due to traffic.

packages.name: THE IMPERIAL CITIES OF MOROCCO
packages.overview: Journey through Morocco's imperial cities: Marrakech, Casablanca, Rabat, Meknes, and Fes.

itineraire.title: Arrival in Marrakech
itineraire.description: Welcome at airport. Transfer to riad. Free day. Overnight at riad.

itineraire.title: Marrakech – Casablanca
itineraire.description: 08:30 departure to Casablanca. Visit Arab League Park, Notre-Dame de Lourdes Church, Habous district, and Hassan II Mosque (exterior). Lunch at local restaurant. Overnight at hotel.

itineraire.title: Casablanca – Rabat – Meknes – Fes
itineraire.description: Visit Rabat: Royal Palace (exterior), Hassan Tower, Mohammed V Mausoleum. Continue to Meknes. Lunch en route. Continue to Fes. Overnight at hotel.

itineraire.title: Fes
itineraire.description: Full day exploring Fes medina, Andalusian quarter, Al Quaraouiyine Mosque, Bou Inania Madrasa, and tanneries. Lunch at traditional restaurant. Overnight at hotel.

itineraire.title: Fes – Ifrane – Beni Mellal – Marrakech
itineraire.description: Cross Middle Atlas through Ifrane and Azrou. Lunch in Beni Mellal. Continue to Marrakech with stop at palm grove. Overnight at hotel.

itineraire.description: Breakfast. Transfer to airport for return flight.

practical_info.pickup: Representative outside terminal, left side near Voyage Privé banner.

packages.name: THE IMPERIAL CITIES, CHEFCHAOUEN – 5 NIGHTS
packages.overview: Discover Morocco's imperial cities plus the blue pearl of Chefchaouen.

itineraire.title: Arrival in Marrakech
itineraire.description: Welcome at airport. Transfer to riad. Free day. Overnight at riad.

itineraire.title: Marrakech – Casablanca – Rabat
itineraire.description: 08:00 departure to Casablanca. Visit Arab League Park, Habous district, Hassan II Mosque (exterior). Continue to Rabat. Visit Hassan Tower and Mohammed V Mausoleum. Overnight at hotel.

itineraire.title: Rabat – Meknes – Fes
itineraire.description: Departure to Meknes. Visit El Hedim Square, Dar Jamaï Museum, Moulay Ismail Mausoleum, Sahrij Souani. Lunch. Continue to Fes. Overnight at hotel.

itineraire.title: Fes – Chefchaouen
itineraire.description: Early departure to Chefchaouen. Explore the blue city, visit Kasbah, and enjoy free time in the main square. Return to Fes in afternoon. Overnight at hotel.

itineraire.title: Fes – Ifrane – Beni Mellal – Marrakech
itineraire.description: Departure via Azrou and cedar forests. Lunch in Beni Mellal. Continue to Marrakech with stop at palm grove. Overnight at hotel.

itineraire.title: Departure
itineraire.description: Breakfast. Transfer to airport for return flight.

practical_info.pickup: Representative outside terminal, left side near Voyage Privé banner.
practical_info.medina_access: Riads not accessible by car - porters available.
practical_info.notes: This itinerary may be modified up to 48h before arrival.

packages.name: HIGH ATLAS & AGAFAY DESERT SAFARI
packages.overview: An adventurous journey through the High Atlas mountains and the Agafay Desert, combining trekking, Berber culture, and desert camping.

itineraire.title: Arrival in Marrakech
itineraire.description: Welcome at airport. Transfer to riad. Free day. Overnight at riad.

itineraire.title: Marrakech – Asni – Ouirgane
itineraire.description: Departure through Haouz Plain, visit Aghmat, continue to Ighref and Jebel Yagour. Panoramic views of Berber villages. Discover Ghighaya Valley and Sidi Fares village. Descend to Asni and Ouirgane. Dinner and overnight at hotel in Ouirgane.

itineraire.title: Ouirgane – Aït Tirghuit – Anougal – Amizmiz
itineraire.description: Journey south of High Atlas Plateau. Cross Asni Valley, Marigha Valley, and Kik Plateau. Visit Oued Nfiss Valley and Berber villages. Stop at Aït Terghuit, visit Imi n Tala springs. Optional lunch with local family. Arrive in Amizmiz for traditional Berber dinner. Overnight at guesthouse.

itineraire.title: Amizmiz – Azgour – Imi-ndounit Gorges – Taskourt – Agafay
itineraire.description: Breakfast with mountain views. Journey through Tizguine Valleys with views of Mount Aberji and Tizgui Mountain. Visit Toulkine Plateau, optional walk. Lunch at traditional inn. Continue to Imi-ndounit Gorges. Short walk to river gorge. Continue to Agafay Desert. Traditional dinner at Canyon Lodge Camp. Overnight at camp.

itineraire.title: Agafay – Marrakech
itineraire.description: Morning stroll to watch sunrise over Agafay hills and Atlas Mountains. Free morning for walks or pool. Early afternoon return to Marrakech. Check-in at riad. Dinner and overnight at riad.

itineraire.title: Marrakech
itineraire.description: Free day at leisure to explore Marrakech. Overnight at riad.

itineraire.title: Marrakech
itineraire.description: Free day. Optional activities: Majorelle Garden and YSL Museum visit, or Moroccan cooking class (supplement payable on site). Overnight at riad.

itineraire.title: Departure
itineraire.description: Breakfast. Transfer to airport for return flight.

practical_info.pickup: Representative outside terminal, left side near Voyage Privé banner.
practical_info.medina_access: Riads not accessible by car - porters available.
practical_info.notes: This itinerary involves walking and is recommended for active travelers. Local taxes payable on arrival.
